name: Elementower
description:
Your town is being attacked by elemental monsters! Take the roll of the mighty warriror Astra to give your enemies a taste of their own powers, but you'll have to be careful, not all monsters are vulnreable to the same elements, mental agility will take a huge part in this battle.

How to play:

Click on title (ELEMENTOWER) once the game load to begin

Left click to shoot

Z/X To change weapon

After first stage: Wheel to change element, right click to fire cannon
